snippet: In a commercial, the president’s campaign responds to a conservative group’s ad, while asserting that Mitt Romney would send jobs overseas if he was elected.
abstract: Text and assessment of 30-second ad released by Pres Obama's campaign that provides a rebuttal to conservative group's anti-Obama ad as well as a slam at Mitt Romney, the presumptive Republican nominee.
lead_paragraph: In a commercial, the president’s campaign responds to a conservative group’s ad, while asserting that Mitt Romney would send jobs overseas if he was elected.

headline.seo: Ad Watch: Obama Spot Offers a Rebuttal and a Jab
headline.main: Obama Spot Offers a Rebuttal and a Jab at Romney
headline.print_headline: Obama Spot Offers a Rebuttal and a Jab at Romney
